48.eng-name: The Book Pertaining to the Remembrance of Allah, Supplication, Repentance and Seeking Forgiveness

hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated on the authority of A'mash with the same chain of transmitters, but there is no mention of these words:" He draws near Me by the space of a hand, I draw near him by the space (covered) by two hands

chapter.ara-name: باب الْحَثِّ عَلَى ذِكْرِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى
chapter.eng-name: Encouragement To Remember Allah, Exalted is He
